rows: Name (theCodeproperty value) of the business process to run. Optional if thesysProcessIdparameter is used.
The ID of the business process to run. Optional if thesysProcessNameparameter is used.
Key-value collection of input business process parameters where key is the parameter code (theCodeproperty value) and the value is the parameter value.
html:
Parameter

Parameter type

sysProcessName

Name (the Code property value) of the business process to run. Optional if the sysProcessId parameter is used.

sysProcessId

The ID of the business process to run. Optional if the sysProcessName parameter is used.

parameters

Key-value collection of input business process parameters where key is the parameter code (the Code property value) and the value is the parameter value.
